text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: It's really cute and soothing to watch♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I should buy that 
marimo-kun a friend to take home♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Oh, by the way, Cafe-chan told me that 
there's a place in Lake Akan where you can 
see the natural marimo. Should we go check 
it out?♪
